short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your search in a single tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SearchDeck is a browser extension that sends queries to several search engines and then aggregate the results into search panels.

SearchDeck Features: 

Search on any webpage
1. Press S on any webpage
2. Search the internet with default interest groups
3. Select a domain/sub-domain to search insite data
4. Press S or ESC to exit Search Deck

Manage your search
1. Search your browsing histories and bookmarks
2. Search options in suggestion popup
3. Compare query results side-by-side
4. Duplicate results are marked for you

Save your crowded tab bar
1. Add/delete a search panel easily
2. Fetch from multiple search engines in parallel
3. Fetch from multiple groups in a single search
4. Multiple searches, multiple groups, multiple panels
5. All in a single tab
